sections.text:
25-2723.Probate books, enumeration.

The probate books shall consist of a probate record, a fee book, a general index to probate records, an index to wills deposited, and such additional records as are needed to carry out the provisions of the Nebraska Probate Code.

SourceG.S.1873, c. 14, § 32, p. 270;Laws 1895, c. 31, § 1, p. 156;Laws 1909, c. 41, § 1, p. 228;R.S.1913, § 1233;C.S.1922, § 1156;C.S.1929, § 27-535;R.S.1943, § 24-535;Laws 1972, LB 1032, § 54;Laws 1975, LB 481, § 6;R.S.1943, (1985), § 24-554.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Probate Code, see section 30-2201.
